title: Organize Everything
description:
Planish helps you keep track of all your tasks, deadlines, and habits in one place.
Plan your day, week, and month with ease.

title: Get Ai Suggestions
description:
Split your tasks into smaller steps with AI.
Planish helps you break down big projects into manageable pieces.

title: Track Progress Visually
description:
See what's done, what's coming up, and what's overdue — at a glance.
No more guessing or digging through files.

title: Study Without the Stress
description:
Planish breaks big tasks into smaller wins.
You focus on doing — not figuring out what to do.
